alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 9:55PM CDT until April 05 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Webb County in south central Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 954 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Rio Bravo, or 17 miles north of San Ygnacio, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Ranchitos Las Lomas, Aguilares and Mirando City. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 804 and 820. US Highway 83 near mile marker 734. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
